title: The Granite Family
description: Follow the lives of Frank and Wanda Granite, a different modern Stone Age family.
altHero: Frank, a caveman, is being kicked out of his stone house by a long dinosaur tail
alt1: Frank is locked out and talks to his friend Bob
alt2: Frank wipes his bare feet on a trilobite doormat
alt3: a prehistoric bird yells with its tongue out
alt4: Frank looks bewildered as he walks through the door
